channel.title: Rebolbot future
channel.description: Hi guys I think it is time to turn off the old rebolbot server as I have not been using it for a while. @rgchris may still have a few things running on it, so this is a heads up that I plan to turn it off in the next month or so. All the best, John

item.title: Rebolbot future
item.dc:creator: johnk
item.description:
Hi guys
I think it is time to turn off the old rebolbot server as I have not been using it for a while. @rgchris may still have a few things running on it, so this is a heads up that I plan to turn it off in the next month or so.
All the best,
John
